thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 16 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Horizontal Software Completes Capital Increase Of 1.3 Million Euros‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Horizontal Software Completes Capital Increase Of 1.3 Million Euros‍​
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - HORIZONTAL SOFTWARE SAS:
* COMPLETES CAPITAL INCREASE BY PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF 1.3 MILLION EUROS‍​
* SUBSCRIPTION PRICE: EUR 6.19 PER SHARE * NEW ISSUED SHARES REPRESENT 11.3 PERCENT OF CAPITAL IN CIRCULATION
* CAPITAL INCREASE INTENDED TO ACCELERATE THE TRANSFORMATION OF THE USERS FREEMIUM OF ITS SAAS-APP YOOTALENT SOLUTION TO THE PREMIUM‍​ Source text : bit.ly/2Hi9hhI Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
